projects.name: Terrarium
projects.blurb: Part of my sketch a day challenge. I really like how this one came out.

projects.name: UFO
projects.blurb: Part of my sketch dail challenge series. I was really happy with the idea and the execution wasn't bad either.

projects.name: Bridges on Mute
projects.blurb: This is a self published joke that is targetted for a spicific group of people and it's pages are mostly blank.

projects.name: Brief Case (sketch)
projects.blurb: One of the sketch daily prompts was Briefcase. I went for the obvious pun and made an image showing a brief case. A little animation in there for fun!

projects.name: Brief Cases
projects.blurb: A friend and I were talking about collective nouns for animals... So I took the Brief Case (sketch) and enhanced it with puns! A Lawyer Business of ferrets, a parliment of Owl judges, etc. Since I was already thinking about my ferrets.biz site I was determined to bring it to there. So then I started thinking what would this animal world look like. I branched out past Judge Hooty and the Kangaroo Court. I imagined there was a person washed up on an island full of animals who had evolved. I was crankig out images for it and it seemed like it had steam.

projects.name: Beach Hyena
projects.blurb: In the Brief Cases 'universe' this little guy loves going to the beach. I figured Hyenas laugh, so they have to like a good time.
